metadata.Title: CVE-2021-36411 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.Description: An issue has been found in libde265 v1.0.8 due to incorrect access control. A SEGV caused by a READ memory access in function derive_boundaryStrength of deblock.cc has occurred. The vulnerability causes a segmentation fault and application crash, which leads to remote denial of service.

criterions.comment: libde265 package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
